java/liquibase/ant/TagDatabaseTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00004 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00005 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00006 
00007 public class TagDatabaseTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00008 
00009     private String tag;
00010 
00011     public String getTag() {
00012         return tag;
00013     }
00014 
00015     public void setTag(String tag) {
00016         this.tag = tag;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00020         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getTag()) == null) {
00021             throw new BuildException("tagDatabase requires tag parameter to be set");
00022         }
00023 
00024         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00025         try {
00026             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00027             liquibase.tag(getTag());
00028 
00029         } catch (Exception e) {
00030             throw new BuildException(e);
00031         } finally {
00032             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00033         }
00034     }
00035 }
